de.geofencing.client.restClient

Class RestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.client.restClient.RestClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RestAdminClient, RestDeviceClient

    public abstract class RestClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a client for the restful web service. Defined methods are used by both, the RestDeviceClient and the RestAdminClient. For the specific methods the RestDeviceClient or the RestAdminClient has to be used.
    Author:
    Markus Thral

      Constructors

      RestClient(java.lang.String restServiceURL)
      Constructs new RestClient

      Deletes device with the given device id from the GeoSystem with the given system id
      SystemBeacons getBeaconData(SystemBeacons beacons)
      Gets additional data of the given SystemBeacons from server if available, otherwise the beacons are returned without data.

        restServiceURL - URL of the web service (i.e. https://127.0.0.1:8080/Geofencing)

    • Method Detail

      • allowAllCertificates

        public void allowAllCertificates()
        Allows HttpClient to accept all certificates

      • setAuthorization

        public void setAuthorization(java.lang.String authorization)
        Sets authorization information transmitted in the authorization header
        Parameters:
        authorization - Administrator password or Device address

      • setRestServiceURL

        public void setRestServiceURL(java.lang.String restServiceURL)
        Sets URL of the geofencing rest service
        Parameters:
        restServiceURL - URL of the web service (i.e. https://127.0.0.1:8080/Geofencing)

      • isServiceRunning

        public boolean isServiceRunning()
        Gets state of the web service to check service URL
        Returns:
        true if service is running, false if not reachable

      • getDevice

        public Device getDevice(int deviceID)
                 throws RestClientException
        Gets Device with the given deviceID
        Parameters:
        deviceID - DeviceID of the Device
        Returns:
        Device with the given deviceID
        Throws:
        RestClientException - with ErrorCode if a problem occurs

      • getBeaconData

        public SystemBeacons getBeaconData(SystemBeacons beacons)
                            throws RestClientException
        Gets additional data of the given SystemBeacons from server if available, otherwise the beacons are returned without data.
        Parameters:
        beacons - Beacons to get the data for
        Returns:
        SystemBeacons object with the beacons
        Throws:
        RestClientException - with ErrorCode if a problem occurs

      • deleteDevice

        public boolean deleteDevice(int deviceID)
                     throws RestClientException
        Deletes device with the given device id from the GeoSystem with the given system id
        Parameters:
        deviceID - DeviceID of the Device
        Returns:
        true if Device is deleted
        Throws:
        RestClientException - with ErrorCode if a problem occurs
